text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Cherokee, California |settlement_type = Unincorporated community |image_skyline = Historic mining town Cherokee, California, in May 2020.jpg |imagesize = 250px |image_caption = The Cherokee Museum |image_map = File:Butte County California Incorporated and Unincorporated areas Cherokee Highlighted 0612818.svg |map_caption = Location of Cherokee in Butte County, California |pushpin_map = California |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_mapsize = |pushpin_map_caption = Location in California |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = United States |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = California |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Butte County |subdivision_type3 = |subdivision_name3 = | population_total = 88 | population_as_of = 2020 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_footnotes = | unit_pref = US | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = 1.922 | area_land_sq_mi = 1.751 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.171 | area_total_km2 = 4.976 | area_land_km2 = 4.534 | area_water_km2 = 0.442 | area_water_percent = 8.9 | area_note = |timezone = Pacific |utc_offset = -8 |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 | |established_title = |established_date = |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 398 |elevation_ft = 1306 |postal_code_type = ZIP code |postal_code = 95965 |area_code_type = Area code |area_code = 530 |blank_name = GNIS feature IDs |blank_info = , |website = |footnotes = ; }} Cherokee is a census-designated place (CDP) in Butte County, California. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in California Category:Settlements in Butte County, California
